trans-unit.source: Contains information needed to perform schema importation using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> and <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter"></xref> infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 包含執行 結構描述匯入作業使用所需的資訊<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>和<xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter"></xref>基礎結構。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The XmlSerializerImportOptions is used by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerMessageContractImporter>.
It is also used with the [ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) with the `/useXmlSerializer` (`/uxs)` switch.
trans-unit.target: 它也可用於以[ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)與`/useXmlSerializer`(`/uxs)`切換。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.XmlSerializerImportOptions"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.XmlSerializerImportOptions"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.XmlSerializerImportOptions"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.XmlSerializerImportOptions"></xref>類別具有指定<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides a container for the <xref href="System.CodeDom"></xref> program graph.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供容器<xref href="System.CodeDom"></xref>程式圖形。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ClrNamespace property that contains the types being mapped to the XML namespace.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 ClrNamespace 屬性，其中包含對應的 XML 命名空間的型別。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains types being mapped.
Gets the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> object that provides a container for the <xref href="System.CodeDom"></xref> program graph.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref>物件，提供容器<xref href="System.CodeDom"></xref>程式圖形。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides a container for a program graph.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供程式圖形的容器。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider"></xref> object that checks whether particular options for a target language are supported.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider"></xref>會檢查是否支援目標語言之特定選項的物件。

trans-unit.source: An object that checks target language options.
trans-unit.target: 物件，檢查目標語言選項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref> object that contains the code generation options specified in the XML text file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>物件，其中包含 XML 文字檔案中指定的程式碼產生選項。

trans-unit.source: An object containing code generation options.
trans-unit.target: 包含程式碼產生選項的物件。
